author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The other week I put out a video on the algorithm changes to Youtube that appear to be culling both VOD views and livestream viewers whilst not effecting overall revenue, the problem is Youtube hasn't explained what is going on but now people are discovering the video I put out on the problem
